# openlexicon.fetcher

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `openlexicon.fetcher` is to facilitate the downloaf of lexical databases related to the openlexicon project.

## Installation

You can install the development version of openlexicon.fetcher from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("chrplr/openlexicon/packages/openlexicon.fetcher")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(openlexicon.fetcher)
## basic example code
```
